alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 6:19PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A WINTRY MIX WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN LATAH...NORTHEASTERN GARFIELD AND SOUTHEASTERN WHITMAN COUNTIES... At 516 PM PDT, a thunderstorm with mixed precipitation of heavy snow and graupel was located 7 miles southwest of Pullman, moving east at 40 mph. Locations impacted include... Pullman, Moscow, Troy, Wawawai, Almota, Mayview and Joel. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 334 and 350. U.S. Highway 195 in Washington between mile markers 10 and 26. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling. Showers will be capable of producing a quick half inch of snow or graupel.
